solution_line_template: The oldest son gets {oldest_son_cookies} cookies and the youngest gets {youngest_son_cookies}, so every day they eat {oldest_son_cookies}+{youngest_son_cookies} = <<{oldest_son_cookies}+{youngest_son_cookies}={daily_consumption}>>{daily_consumption} cookies

There are {total_cookies_in_box} cookies in a box and the boys eat {daily_consumption} cookies a day, so the box will last {total_cookies_in_box}/{daily_consumption} = <<{total_cookies_in_box}/{daily_consumption}={days_box_lasts}>>{days_box_lasts} days
